org.diylc.swingframework.ruler
Class Ruler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.diylc.swingframework.ruler.Ruler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Ruler
extends javax.swing.JComponent

JComponent that renders ruler. It features configurable units (cm or in), orientation and ability to indicate cursor position.

Author:
Branislav Stojkovic
See Also:
Serialized Form

setIndicatorValue

public void setIndicatorValue(int indicatortValue)
Changes cursor position. If less than zero, indication will not be rendered. For horizontal ruler this should be X coordinate of mouse position, and Y for vertical.

Parameters:
indicatortValue -
